meanings: (부분) each[every] part, (부서) each[every] department[section], (정부의) each[every] ministry[department]

examples.korean: place each department under a state minister 발음듣기 각부를 장관 밑에 두다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: place each department under a state minister 발음

examples.korean: She found salespeople incompetent and department managers negligent. 발음듣기 그 여자가 보기에는 판매원들은 무능하고 각부 주임들은 태만했다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: She found salespeople incompetent and department managers negligent. 발음

examples.korean: The arteries carry the blood from the heart to the various parts of the body. 발음듣기 동맥은 혈액을 심장에서 전신 각부에 나른다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: The arteries carry the blood from the heart to the various parts of the body. 발음

examples.korean: The committee reportedly told Prime Minister Lee Hae-chan and other ministerial heads that the main information and communication facilities such as Internet Exchange Points, lacked proper defense measures. 발음듣기 정책평가위원회는 이해찬 국무총리를 비롯한 각부 장관들에게 데이터연동점(IXP) 등과 같은 주요 정보통신 시설들이 적절한 방어 수단이 부족한 상황이라고 보고했다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: The committee reportedly told Prime Minister Lee Hae-chan and other ministerial heads that the main information and communication facilities such as Internet Exchange Points, lacked proper defense measures. 발음

examples.korean: Parts of the pollen and ovary combine, and the ovary grows large. 발음듣기 꽃가루와 씨방의 각부가 합쳐지고, 씨방이 크게 자라납니다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. gray(orch****) Web Collection
examples.english: Parts of the pollen and ovary combine, and the ovary grows large. 발음
